text: "Fuck You" is a song by English singer Lily Allen from her second album, It's Not Me, It's You (2009), as her third international single. Its lyrics are about being against racism, homophobia, and war-mongering. The song was a hit in mainland Europe, topping the chart in Flanders for three weeks and reaching number two in Wallonia and the Netherlands. ==References== Category:2009 songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:LGBT songs Category:Lily Allen songs
title: Fuck You (Lily Allen song)
